text.3_Chapter, 0_Verse: In those days Hashem will do Gathering of Exiles
text.3_Chapter, 1_Verse: I will gather the nations to the Valley of Jehoshaphat and judge them
text.3_Chapter, 2_Verse: They sold our kids for prostitutes and wine
text.3_Chapter, 3_Verse: You think you'll pay me backâ€½ I'll pay YOU back!
text.3_Chapter, 5_Verse: You sold my people as slaves
text.3_Chapter, 6_Verse: Here's how I'll pay you back
text.3_Chapter, 7_Verse: I'll sell your children as slaves
text.3_Chapter, 8_Verse: Calling all warriors! Big war coming!
text.3_Chapter, 10_Verse: All the nations should gather together
text.3_Chapter, 11_Verse: Gather to Valley of Jehoshaphat for a big judgment
text.3_Chapter, 12_Verse: Harvest time for the evil enemies
text.3_Chapter, 14_Verse: The sun, moon and stars will go dark
text.3_Chapter, 15_Verse: Hashem will call out. Heavens will shake. He'll protect His people.
text.3_Chapter, 16_Verse: Jerusalem will be holy. Strangers won't got there anymore.
text.3_Chapter, 17_Verse: The mountains will be full of wine.The valleys will be full of milk. Water will flow from the Beit Hamikdash
text.3_Chapter, 18_Verse: Egypt and Edom will be destroyed
text.3_Chapter, 19_Verse: Judah and Jerusalem will last forever
text.3_Chapter, 20_Verse: I will cleanse, but blood I won't cleanse
